verbose_text: TNF, IL-12, and IFN-gamma are essential cytokines that contribute to protective immunity against M. tuberculosis; whereas, cytokines, such as IL-10 and TGF-beta, down-regulate the immune response and inhibit excessive inflammatory response.
evidence: immunity against M. tuberculosis                                 ; whereas, cytokines, such as IL-10 and TGF-beta, down-regulate the immune response and inhibit excessive inflammatory response
